title: BREAKING POINT - ARMA 3 [NOSTEAM]
description:
The Zombie Infection - Breaking Point

Mod for Arma III (3)


Is a zombie survival mod for Arma 3,  <a href="
http://www.thezombieinfection.com/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.thezombieinfection.com/</a>


Gameplay seen on frankieon1080p youtube - ZOMBIE PROBLEM! - Arma 3 DayZ


Compatible with - Arma 3 [Update 10] [RePack]


Please host a [NOSTEAM] server with these files, so we can [NOSTEAM] /Arma III BREAKING POINT


- Installation Instructions!

1.  Download  - Arma 3 [Update 10] [RePack]
 (found elsewhere)

2. Copy @BreakingPoint folder into Arma 3 Directory (c:/Programfiles/arma3/@breakingpoint

3. Click Arma 3 - Play / Multiplayer/ Remote and type in [NOSTEAM]
to join server. 

4. Need someone to host a server and put the title to include [NOSTEAM]
